feed.title: Track Awesome Adafruitio Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome Adafruit IO guides, videos, libraries, frameworks, software and resources.

entry.title: Awesome Adafruitio Updates on Feb 14 - Feb 20, 2022
entry.content:
News

  • Adafruit IO on Hackaday - Hackaday posts related to Adafruit IO.

Social

  • Adafruit IO Development Blog - Adafruit IO News and Release Notes, straight from the source.
  • #AdafruitIO tagged photos & videos on Instagram - Posts on Instagram tagged Adafruit IO.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Feb 14 - Feb 20, 2022

entry.title: Awesome Adafruitio Updates on Jul 22 - Jul 28, 2019
entry.content:
Guides

  • Welcome to Adafruit IO! - An overview of Adafruit IO and the service.
  • All the Internet of Things: Adafruit IO - An episode of Adafruit and Digi-Key's All the Internet of Things, provides a deep dive into everything Adafruit IO has to offer.

Code

  • Adafruit IO HTTP API Documentation - Adafruit IO HTTP API provides access to your Adafruit IO data from any programming language or environment which can speak HTTP.
  • Adafruit IO MQTT API Documentation - Adafruit MQTT API provides access to your Adafruit IO data from any MQTT Client.
  • Adafruit IO MQTT API Cookbook - Recipes related to the Adafruit IO API which have been found useful in the past.

Newsletter

  • Adafruit IoT Newsletter - A monthly newsletter on the Internet-of-Things, a spam-free list.

News

  • Adafruit IO on Hackster.io - Hackster posts related to Adafruit IO.

Social

  • Adafruit IO tagged on Reddit - Reddit posts relating to Adafruit IO.
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Jul 22 - Jul 28, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Adafruitio Updates on Apr 29 - May 05, 2019
entry.content:
Guides

  • Adafruit IO Basics - Learn the basics of Adafruit IO and interfacing the service with your hardware.
  • learn.adafruit.com Adafruit IO - Adafruit Learning System Guides on Adafruit IO.

Community

  • Adafruit IO Discord channel #help-with-adafruit-io - 24/7 chat and support for Adafruit IO.
  • Adafruit IO Forums - The Adafruit support forum on Adafruit IO.

Code

  • Adafruit IO Arduino Library (⭐219) - An Arduino client for Adafruit IO.
  • Adafruit IO CircuitPython Library (⭐49) - A CircuitPython client for Adafruit IO.
  • Adafruit IO Python Library (⭐229) - A Python client for Adafruit IO.
  • Adafruit IO Ruby Library - A Ruby client for Adafruit IO.
  • Adafruit IO Go Library (⭐16) - A Go client for Adafruit IO.

Hardware

  • Adafruit-Produced Boards - Where to buy Adafruit IO compatible boards produced by Adafruit.

Newsletter

  • Archives of all newsletters - List of every newsletter published.

Social

  • #AdafruitIO tagged on Twitter, latest - Twitter posts tagged Adafruit IO.
  • Adafruit IO Twitter - Twitter account aggregator for Adafruit IO news and more.
  • Adafruit IO on Google+ Makers, hackers, artists & engineers - Google Plus posts related to Adafruit IO.
  • Adafruit IO community on Reddit - Dedicated home of Adafruit IO on reddit /r/adafruitio.
  • Adafruit IO on Instructables - How-tos, guides, and more, using Adafruit IO on Autodesk's Instructables.

Events

  • ASK AN ENGINEER, Wednesday 8pm ET on YouTube LIVE - The longest running YouTube live show about electronics, information often on during an "Adafruit IO Update" segment. New compatible hardware during "New New New" segment.
entry.summary: 17 awesome projects updated on Apr 29 - May 05, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Adafruitio Updates on Jun 04 - Jun 10, 2018
entry.content:
Code

  • Adafruit IO Node.js Library (⭐102) - A Node.js Adafruit IO client, local server, and TLS Tunnel.

Social

  • AdafruitIO videos on YouTube, latest - YouTube posts tagged AdafruitIO.

Events

  • Weekly Adafruit Show-and-tell, Wednesday 7:30pm ET on Google+ Hangouts - The weekly Adafruit Show-and-tell program often has Adafruit IO-related projects on display.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jun 04 - Jun 10, 2018
